func:
var result = [];
var payloads = [
    ['cmnd/smart_plug/status',5],
    ['cmnd/smart_plug/status',11],
    ['cmnd/front_porch/status',5],
    ['cmnd/front_porch/status',11],
    ['cmnd/front_porch2/status',5],
    ['cmnd/front_porch2/status',11],
    ['cmnd/rear_porch/status',5],
    ['cmnd/rear_porch/status',11],
    ['cmnd/rear_porch2/status',5],
    ['cmnd/rear_porch2/status',11],
    ['cmnd/kitchen/status',5],
    ['cmnd/kitchen/status',11],
    ['cmnd/main_bedroom/status',5],
    ['cmnd/main_bedroom/status',11],
    ['cmnd/main_bedroom2/status',5],
    ['cmnd/main_bedroom2/status',11],
    ['cmnd/childroom/status',5],
    ['cmnd/childroom/status',11],
    ['cmnd/classroom_a1/status',5],
    ['cmnd/classroom_a1/status',11],
    ['cmnd/classroom_a2/status',5],
    ['cmnd/classroom_a2/status',11],
    ['cmnd/classroom_a3/status',5],
    ['cmnd/classroom_a3/status',11],
    ['cmnd/classroom_b1/status',5],
    ['cmnd/classroom_b1/status',11],
    ['cmnd/classroom_b2/status',5],
    ['cmnd/classroom_b2/status',11],
    ['cmnd/classroom_b3/status',5],
    ['cmnd/classroom_b3/status',11],
    ];
payloads.forEach(function(v, i){
   result.push({topic:v[0], payload:v[1]});
});

return [result];
